data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Saint-Paul, Reunion.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint-Paul, Reunion
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Saint-Paul, Reunion to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Saint-Paul, Reunion to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Saint-Paul, Reunion.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Saint-Leu
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Saint-Leu, Saint-Paul, Reunion.
God, we pray both the men and women of Saint-Paul, Reunion will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Lord, help the people of Saint-Paul, Reunion to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint-Paul, Reunion has a population of 219,900.

We estimate Saint-Paul has 14,990 people who might know Jesus, 174,414 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 30,495 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 14 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Saint-Paul who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
